name: MapGlow.com
overview:
MapGlow is a hot(cool) way to view geo-social data based on your interests. Find out what’s happening, when and where. Connect with friends, or just connect with others that are thinking the same thing.

Nano blogging just became interactive. When you submit a shout-out, you are saying to the entire world , look at me! When you view a category map overlay, you can see a visual representation of where others have shouted the same thing. We couldn’t possible think of all the ways MapGlow could be used, but here are a few examples:

See where your friends are at a football game or concert.

Invite others to come party, by shouting-out that this club is jump’n.

Looking for the best beach to surf, see where others are already having fun.

Win awards by creating new categories, visiting merchants, and more…
